game.title: The Lost Relic
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient relic from the dragon's lair
game.description: The kingdom's most sacred relic has been stolen by a terrifying dragon. The king has requested your help to retrieve it. You must journey into the dragon's lair, defeat the beast, and return the relic to its rightful place.
game.reward: 5000 gold pieces and the King's gratitude.

task.description: You need to cross the dangerous Dark Forest and climb the treacherous Dead Mountain to reach the dragon's lair.
task.location: Dragon's lair at the peak of Dead Mountain.

task.description: Fight and defeat the fearsome dragon to rescue the relic. Be cautious as the dragon is fierce and deadly.
task.location: Inside the dragon's lair, Dead Mountain.

task.description: Once the dragon is defeated, retrieve the relic and bring it back to King Alaric.
